summary: The film tells the story of 2 brothers. One punk, one salesman. The salesman get laid off, and slowly becomes a punk like his brother.
cast: Benoît Poelvoorde|Albert Dupontel|Brigitte Fontaine|Areski Belkacem|Bouli Lanners|Serge Larivière|Stéphanie Pillonca|Miss Ming|Chloé Mons|Yolande Moreau|Gérard Depardieu|Vincent Tavier|Jacqueline Emptoz Lacôte|Joseph Dahan|Théo Raino|Liao Lei Zhang|Nicole Marine|Marie-France Arramon|Denis Barthe|Pierre Ghenassia|Ramata Diallo|Dodo Avrel|David Salles|Brigitte Bourneuf|Guénaëlle Imbert|Marius Bertram|Christian Charlemagne|Alain Magnan|Marthe Caufman|Noël Godin|Raymond Defossé|Didier Wampas|Nicolas Schauer|Philippe Almosnino|Jean-Michel Lejoux|Antoine Masy-Périer
title: Le grand soir
